main.java.entity

Class CircuitManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • main.java.entity.CircuitManagement

  • public class CircuitManagement
extends java.util.Observable
    The Class CircuitManagement is used as an entry point into the model for the controller. It manages all the model (load the map, load the delivery list create the circuits)

             throws LoadMapException,
                    ForgivableXMLException
        Load map. (load all nodes and bows)
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        Throws:
        LoadMapException - the load map exception
        ForgivableXMLException - when a problem occurred while loading the map but without avoiding it to be created

      • cluster

        public java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Delivery>> cluster()
                                                      throws NoRepositoryException
        Clustering algorithm, performing K-means clustering algorithm and if the clusters are unbalanced in terms of cardinality, balance those clusters.
        Returns:
        a list containing all clusters
        Throws:
        NoRepositoryException - when no repository is found in the delivery list

      • KmeansClustering

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Delivery>>,java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>>> KmeansClustering(int numberOfClusters,
                                                                                                                                                            java.util.List<Delivery> deliveriesToCluster)
        K-means clustering algorithm.
        Parameters:
        numberOfClusters - the expected number of clusters
        deliveriesToCluster - all deliveries to partition in clusters
        Returns:
        a pair containing the clusters and their respective barycenters.

      • KmeansClusteringStep

        public java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Delivery>> KmeansClusteringStep(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>> barycenters,
                                                                          java.util.List<Delivery> deliveriesToCluster)
        Associates all deliveries to their closest barycenter and updates all barycenters. Each set of association to a barycenter results in a new cluster.
        Parameters:
        barycenters - the barycenters of the distribution
        deliveriesToCluster - all deliveries to partition in clusters
        Returns:
        the list containing all clusters

      • addRandomBarycenter

        public void addRandomBarycenter(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>> barycenters,
                                java.util.List<Delivery> deliveries)
        Adds a random barycenter.
        Parameters:
        barycenters - the list containing all barycenters
        deliveries - the list containing all deliveries

      • calculateCircuits

        public void calculateCircuits(int nbDeliveryman,
                              boolean continueInterruptedCalculation)
                       throws MapNotChargedException,
                              DijkstraException,
                              NoRepositoryException,
                              TSPLimitTimeReachedException,
                              DeliveriesNotLoadedException
        Generic method to call when calculation of the circuits is asked by HCI call the cluster method and create the circuits one by one after having calculated the atomic path between each delivery.
        Parameters:
        nbDeliveryman - the number delivery-men
        continueInterruptedCalculation - true if the method is called after having interrupted the calculation at least once
        Throws:
        MapNotChargedException - when the map is not properly charged
        DeliveriesNotLoadedException - when the delivery list is not properly charged
        DijkstraException - when a problem happened during the dijkstra algorithm
        NoRepositoryException - when no repository is found in the delivery list
        TSPLimitTimeReachedException - when the limit time we set for the calculation is reached before the end of the calculation

      • checkNodeInDeliveryList

        public boolean checkNodeInDeliveryList(Node nodeTested)
        Check if a node is contained in the delivery list.
        Parameters:
        nodeTested - the node tested
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • getCircuitIndexByDelivery

        public int getCircuitIndexByDelivery(Delivery delivery)
        Gets the index of the circuit that contains a delivery using the delivery to identify it.
        Parameters:
        delivery - the delivery
        Returns:
        the index of the circuit containing the delivery. -1 if no circuit contains it.

        Gets the index of the circuit that contains a node using the node to identify it
        Parameters:
        delivery - the delivery
        Returns:
        the index of the circuit containing the nodes. -1 if no circuit contains it.

        Checks if a node is also a the repository.
        Parameters:
        nodeTested - the node tested
        Returns:

      • addDelivery

        public void addDelivery(Node nodeDelivery,
                        int duration,
                        Node previousNode,
                        int indexCircuit)
        Adds the delivery after the delivery present at the selected node in the circuit that contains it. It does it by calling the generic add method specifying that we want to modify the delivery list
        Parameters:
        nodeDelivery - the node where the new delivery will be
        duration - the duration of the delivery
        previousNode - the previous node
        indexCircuit - : the index of the circuit which contains the node

      • removeDelivery

        public void removeDelivery(Node nodeDelivery)
                    throws ManagementException
        Removes the delivery at the node selected from the delivery list. It does it by calling the generic remove method specifying that we want to modify the delivery list
        Parameters:
        nodeDelivery - the node delivery
        Throws:
        ManagementException - the management exception

                  throws ManagementException
        Move delivery.
        Parameters:
        node - the node
        previousNode - the previous node
        indexCircuit - : the index of the circuit which contains the node
        Throws:
        ManagementException - the management exception

        public Node getPreviousNode(Node node)
        Gets the previous node in the circuit for the delivery placed at the node selected.

        Returns:
        the previous node or null if there is no previous node
